SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REPLY_NUMBER ASC) RNUM, R.WRITER, R.CONT, R.REPLY_NUMBER, R.BOARD_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(R.INDATE + 9/24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS INDATE, R.REND_PAGE
FROM REPLY R WHERE BOARD_NUMBER = #{board_number} ORDER BY REPLY_NUMBER ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum} AND #{contentNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REPLY_NUMBER ASC) RNUM, R.WRITER, R.CONT, R.REPLY_NUMBER, R.BOARD_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(R.INDATE + 9/24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS INDATE, R.REND_PAGE
FROM RIDER_REPLY R WHERE BOARD_NUMBER = #{board_number} ORDER BY REPLY_NUMBER ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum} AND #{contentNum}

SELECT WRITER, CONT, REPLY_NUMBER, BOARD_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(INDATE + 9/24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS INDATE
FROM RIDER_REPLY
WHERE BOARD_NUMBER = #{board_number}
ORDER BY REPLY_NUMBER ASC
SELECT C.TITLE, C.BOARD_NUMBER, C.MENU_ID, RE.CONT, RE.WRITER FROM CUSTOMER_BOARD C JOIN REPLY RE ON C.BOARD_NUMBER = RE.BOARD_NUMBER WHERE RE.WRITER = #{nickname}
SELECT R.TITLE, R.BOARD_NUMBER, R.MENU_ID, LE.CONT, LE.WRITER FROM RIDER_BOARD R JOIN RIDER_REPLY LE ON R.BOARD_NUMBER = LE.BOARD_NUMBER WHERE LE.WRITER = #{nickname}
